A Bit About Me

I am a Web Developer that graduated from SAIT. I enjoy designing modern websites that are pleasing to the eye.

I love working with CSS but building websites with JavaScript and modern Frameworks is my forte. I have experience with API's and I look forward to working in the web dev industry.

Take a look at my skills with this website!
